title: Author: Mitch McConnell's Focus On Winning Is 'Single-Minded'
teaser: The new Senate majority leader will soon take office. NPR's Eric Westervelt asks Alec MacGillis, author of The Cynic: The Political Education of Mitch McConnell, what his leadership might look like.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
